Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: [E]Light of the [B]world, You stepped [F#m]down into darkness [E]Opened my [Bsus]eyes, let me [E/A]see [E]Beauty that [Bsus]made this [F#m]heart adore You [E]Hope of a [Bsus]life spent with [E/A]You
CHORUS: So here I [B7sus]am to [E]worship, here I am to [B/D#]bow down Here I am to [E/G#]say that You’re my [A]God You’re altogether [E]lovely, altogether [B/D#]worthy Altogether [E/G#]wonderful to [A]me
VERSE 2: [E]King of all [Bsus]days, oh so [F#m]highly exalted [E]Glorious in [Bsus]heaven a[E/A]bove [E]Humbly You [Bsus]came to the [F#m]earth You created [E]All for love’s [Bsus]sake became [E/A]poor
BRIDGE: And I’ll [B/D#]never [E/G#]know how [A]much it cost To [B/D#]see my [E/G#]sin u[A]pon that cross
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 light of the world you stepped down into darkness opened my eyes let me see beauty that made this heart adore you hope of a life spent with you chorus so here i am to worship here i am to bow down here i am to say that youre my god youre altogether lovely altogether worthy altogether wonderful to me verse 2 king of all days oh so highly exalted glorious in heaven above humbly you came to the earth you created all for loves sake became poor bridge and ill never know how much it cost to see my sin upon that cross

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: [E]Light of the [B]world, You stepped [F#m]down into darkness [E]Opened my [Bsus]eyes, let me [E/A]see [E]Beauty that [Bsus]made this [F#m]heart adore You [E]Hope of a [Bsus]life spent with [E/A]You
CHORUS: So here I [B7sus]am to [E]worship, here I am to [B/D#]bow down Here I am to [E/G#]say that You’re my [A]God You’re altogether [E]lovely, altogether [B/D#]worthy Altogether [E/G#]wonderful to [A]me
VERSE 2: [E]King of all [Bsus]days, oh so [F#m]highly exalted [E]Glorious in [Bsus]heaven a[E/A]bove [E]Humbly You [Bsus]came to the [F#m]earth You created [E]All for love’s [Bsus]sake became [E/A]poor
BRIDGE: And I’ll [B/D#]never [E/G#]know how [A]much it cost To [B/D#]see my [E/G#]sin u[A]pon that cross
Chorus: [A]So let this love be like a [B]fire Let our life be like a [C#m]flame Fill our souls with Your [B]desire Let our passion bring You [A]fame
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 light of the world you stepped down into darkness opened my eyes let me see beauty that made this heart adore you hope of a life spent with you chorus so here i am to worship here i am to bow down here i am to say that youre my god youre altogether lovely altogether worthy altogether wonderful to me verse 2 king of all days oh so highly exalted glorious in heaven above humbly you came to the earth you created all for loves sake became poor bridge and ill never know how much it cost to see my sin upon that cross chorus so let this love be like a fire let our life be like a flame fill our souls with your desire let our passion bring you fame

CHORUS: So here I am to [E]worship, here I am to [B/D#]bow down Here I am to [E/G#]say that You’re my [A]God You’re altogether [E]lovely, altogether [B/D#]worthy Altogether [E/G#]wonderful to [A]me
VERSE 2: [E]King of all [B]days, oh so [A]highly exalted [E]Glorious in [B]heaven a[A]bove [E]Humbly You [B]came to the [A]earth You created [E]All for love’s [B]sake became [A]poor
BRIDGE: And I’ll [B/D#]never [E/G#]know how [A]much it cost To [B/D#]see my [E/G#]sin u[A]pon that cross
